00012 /**
00013  * @brief Create timer
00014  *
00015  * @param[in] timer_id identifier of the timer
00016  * @param[in] timer_limit the upper limit
00017  */
00018 oruw_timer::oruw_timer(const char* timer_id, const unsigned int timer_limit) : id(timer_id)
00019 {
00020     qi::os::gettimeofday (&start_time);
00021     limit = (double) timer_limit / 1000000;
00022 }
00023 
00024 
00025 bool oruw_timer::isLimitSatisfied ()
00026 {
00027     qi::os::gettimeofday (&end_time);
00028     double timediff = (double) end_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec + 0.000001* (end_time.tv_usec - start_time.tv_usec);
00029     if (timediff > limit)
00030     {
00031         qiLogInfo ("module.oru_walk", "Timer '%s' (sec): %f > %f (limit)\n", id.c_str(), timediff, limit);
00032         return (false);
00033     }
00034 
00035     return (true);
00036 }
00037 
00038 
00039 /**
00040  * @brief Destroy the timer: log time, throw an error if needed.
00041  */
00042 oruw_timer::~oruw_timer()
00043 {
00044     qi::os::gettimeofday (&end_time);
00045     double timediff = (double) end_time.tv_sec - start_time.tv_sec + 0.000001* (end_time.tv_usec - start_time.tv_usec);
00046 
00047     qiLogInfo ("module.oru_walk", "Timer '%s' (sec): %f\n", id.c_str(), timediff);
00048 }
00049 #endif // ORUW_TIMER_ENABLE

00058 oruw_log::oruw_log (const modelState& state_init, const unsigned int filter_window_len)
00059 {
00060     state_old = state_init;
00061     FJointsLog = fopen ("./oru_joints.log", "w");
00062     FCoMLog = fopen ("./oru_com.log", "w");
00063     FFeetLog = fopen ("./oru_feet.log", "w");
00064     FJointVelocities = fopen ("./oru_joint_velocities.log", "w");
00065     com_filter = new avgFilter(filter_window_len);
00066 }
00067 
00068 oruw_log::~oruw_log ()
00069 {
00070     fclose (FJointsLog);
00071     fclose (FCoMLog);
00072     fclose (FFeetLog);
00073     fclose (FJointVelocities);
00074     delete com_filter;
00075 }

00079 void oruw_log::logJointValues(
00080         const modelState& state_sensor,
00081         const modelState& state_expected)
00082 {
00083     for (int i = 0; i < JOINTS_NUM; i++)
00084     {
00085         fprintf (FJointsLog, "%f ", state_sensor.q[i]);
00086     }
00087     fprintf (FJointsLog, "    ");
00088 
00089 
00090     for (int i = 0; i < JOINTS_NUM; i++)
00091     {
00092         fprintf (FJointsLog, "%f ", state_expected.q[i]);
00093     }
00094     fprintf (FJointsLog, "\n");
00095 }

00101         modelState& state_sensor)
00102 {
00103     fprintf (FCoMLog, "%f %f %f    ", wmg->init_state.x(), wmg->init_state.y(), wmg->hCoM);

00105 
00106     double CoM[3];

00114 void oruw_log::logFeet(nao_igm& nao)
00115 {
00116     double l_expected[POSITION_VECTOR_SIZE];
00117     double l_real[POSITION_VECTOR_SIZE];
00118     double r_expected[POSITION_VECTOR_SIZE];
00119     double r_real[POSITION_VECTOR_SIZE];
00120 
00121     nao.getFeetPositions (
00122             l_expected,
00123             r_expected,
00124             l_real,
00125             r_real);
00126 
00127     fprintf (FFeetLog, "%f %f %f    %f %f %f", 
00128             l_expected[0], l_expected[1], l_expected[2], 
00129             l_real[0], l_real[1], l_real[2]);
00130     fprintf (FFeetLog, "     %f %f %f    %f %f %f\n", 
00131             r_expected[0], r_expected[1], r_expected[2],
00132             r_real[0], r_real[1], r_real[2]);
00133 }

00135 
00136 void oruw_log::logJointVelocities (const modelState& state_current, const double time)
00137 {
00138     for (int i = 0; i < JOINTS_NUM; i++)
00139     {
00140         fprintf (FJointVelocities, "%f ", fabs(state_old.q[i] - state_current.q[i]) / time);
00141         state_old.q[i] = state_current.q[i];
00142     }
00143     fprintf (FJointVelocities, "\n");
00144 }
